Vacations

CRUD application Built with React.js Node.js and MySql

About this project

This poject was made with React for building the user interfaces.I improved my understanding of Front-End programming And also integrated my application to a Node server and MySql database to manage the information.

Live see code

Details

Front End library

React is a powerful framework that does more with less. Figuring out how to apply it, however, means learning both the core of React and how to integrate it with other technologies and approaches.

Node js

I used node js with Express.js Building a RestFull Api for managing requests from the client side.I used json web tokens for authentication.

MySql Database

I used MySql a relational database. I had to learn SQL to Query the database and get the data i need. Also i needed to Creat the database and understand the relations between the informations
